column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My husband and I went here last night for our one-year wedding anniversary. Because we are wine enthusiasts
column2: we brought a very special bottle (2012 Ehlers
column3: Cab Franc) that we'd gotten on our honeymoon and planned to drink on our first anniversary. We often bring our own bottles of wine to restaurants and are always amenable to the corkage fee--we've paid up to $50 in certain instances
column5: it's worth it to have that special bottle to drink.
